verbose_text: Additional pathway development steps included determining the amount of ATP hydrolyzed by SecA for each pORF (i.e., 1 ATP per ~ 25 amino acids) [XREF_BIBR], assigning 23 pORFs to lipoprotein biogenesis [XREF_BIBR], and calculating the number of TatA 's needed for each Tat translocated pORF [XREF_BIBR] (Additional file 1, Additional file 2 : Table S1, Additional file 3 : Figure S1).
